document.full_text: the adoptive parents of two missing colorado boys were charged on thursday with collecting $175,000 in government benefits for the learning disabled children, even though the boys were not living with them and have not been seen for years.
document.title: parents of missing colorado boys charged with taking benefits
lines_and_colors: the adoptive parents of two missing colorado boys were charged on thursday with collecting $175,000 in government benefits for the learning disabled children, even though the boys were not living with them and have not been seen for years.
